title: GitHub Actions CI/CD Pipeline Setup and Debugging
description: Setting up automated testing and deployment with GitHub Actions

steps.description: List existing workflows in the repository
steps.expected_output:
CI               active  1234567
Deploy to Prod   active  1234568
Security Scan    active  1234569
steps.technical_detail: Shows all workflows with their status and workflow ID for reference

steps.description: View recent workflow runs to identify failures
steps.expected_output:
✗  main  CI  Update tests         2m ago
✓  main  CI  Add new feature      1h ago
✗  dev   CI  Experimental change  3h ago
steps.technical_detail: Red X indicates failed runs, green check shows successful runs

steps.description: View detailed logs for failed workflow run
steps.expected_output:
build  Install dependencies
build  npm install
build  Run tests
test   ✗ Error: Module 'axios' not found
test   npm ERR! Test failed
steps.technical_detail: Logs show the failing test step with specific error messages

steps.description: View workflow file to understand the issue
steps.expected_output:
name: CI
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - run: npm install
      - run: npm test
steps.technical_detail: YAML output shows workflow structure and job definitions

steps.description: Create feature branch to fix CI configuration
steps.technical_detail: Isolate CI fixes in separate branch for clean PR

steps.description: Update package.json to include missing dependency
steps.technical_detail: Add axios dependency that was missing and causing test failures

steps.description: Commit fix and push to trigger new workflow run
steps.command: git commit -m 'ci: add missing axios dependency' && git push -u origin fix-ci-missing-dependency
steps.expected_output:
[fix-ci-missing-dependency 123abc] ci: add missing axios dependency
To github.com:user/repo.git
 * [new branch]      fix-ci-missing-dependency -> fix-ci-missing-dependency
steps.technical_detail: Push triggers GitHub Actions to run workflow on new branch

steps.description: Create PR and automatically trigger CI
steps.command: gh pr create --title 'Fix CI: add missing axios dependency' --body 'Resolves test failures by adding axios to dependencies' --base main
steps.expected_output:
Creating pull request for fix-ci-missing-dependency into main
https://github.com/user/repo/pull/456
✓ Pull request created
✓ CI workflow triggered
steps.technical_detail: PR creation automatically triggers configured workflows

steps.expected_output:
Refreshing checks every 10 seconds...
CI               pending  https://github.com/user/repo/runs/789
...
CI               ✓ passed https://github.com/user/repo/runs/789
steps.technical_detail: Watch mode continuously polls for check status updates

steps.description: Merge PR after successful CI run
steps.expected_output:
✓ Squashed and merged pull request #456 (Fix CI: add missing axios dependency)
✓ Deleted branch fix-ci-missing-dependency
steps.technical_detail: Squash merge combines all commits into one, cleanup removes branch

impact: Fixed broken CI pipeline, restored automated testing, and established proper workflow debugging process
